description: This file defines classes and functions for managing project templates, including template registration, project initialization, and file copying with variable replacements. It includes classes for different project templates (e.g., React, Angular, Django), a factory for creating templates, and a main function demonstrating project setup.

classes.name: ProcessingStep
classes.description: Enum for processing steps (Pre-processing and Post-processing).

classes.name: ProjectTemplate
classes.description: Abstract base class for project templates, providing methods for validation, structure generation, testing setup, and processing scripts.

classes.name: ProjectTemplateFactory
classes.description: Factory class for registering and creating project template instances based on project type.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class orchestrating project initialization, including template registration, creation, and waiting for post-processing.

classes.name: FileSystemHelper
classes.description: Helper class with static methods for copying files and directories with variable replacements.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the project by validating parameters, running pre-processing, generating structure, setting up testing, and running post-processing.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Waits for post-processing to complete with a timeout.

methods.name: _run_processing_script
methods.description: Runs a processing script in the background or synchronously depending on process type.

methods.name: register_template
methods.description: Registers a new template class for a specific project type.

methods.name: create_template
methods.description: Creates a template instance for a given project configuration.

methods.name: initialize_project
methods.description: Creates and initializes a project based on the provided configuration.

methods.name: load_config
methods.description: Loads project configuration from a JSON file.
